page.shortlink: api objects image viewer object load image function
page.description: The <ImageViewer>.Object.LoadImage() method loads an image into an Xdialog {ImageViewer} control.

argument.name: ImageName
argument.description: The path and filename of an image to display in an Xdialog {ImageViewer} control. The control will display .BMP, .GIF, .JPEG, and .PNG image types.

section.title: Example
section.description: See ImageViewer Control - Displaying Images on an Xdialog.
